{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the pathway that carries pain and temperature sensations. The spinothalamic tract is known to carry these types of sensations. The lateral spinothalamic tract specifically carries pain and temperature sensations from the body, while the ventral spinothalamic tract carries crude touch and pressure sensations. The corlicospinal and corticocerebral tracts are not involved in carrying these sensations.", "answer_choice": "C. Lateral spinothalamic tract"}
